experience.title: Work Experience
career.1.title: Frontend Programmer Analyst
career.1.description: Technical leadership in the development and deployment of services and applications for public administration. Responsible for designing Continuous Integration and Deployment (CI/CD) circuits and coordinating multidisciplinary teams to ensure quality and efficiency in deliveries.
career.2.title: Project Manager (Logistics)
career.2.description: Direction of the development of a logistics application for Zebra devices. Management of a 2-person team, application of agile methodologies (Scrum/DevOps), integration and refactoring of legacy code, analysis of processes for warehouse task optimization. Technology Stack: Angular, Ionic, Java 8, Redis, MySQL, Elasticsearch.
career.3.title: CRM/BI Development Manager
career.3.description: Leadership in creating an internal tool for data exploitation and customer management. Implementation of Angular, PHP and MySQL stack with advanced integration in Power BI for strategic decision making.
career.4.title: DevOps Specialist and Metrics
career.4.description: Consolidation of DevOps infrastructure and deployment of monitoring systems. Definition of performance metrics for applications and services, ensuring stability and scalability of the technological environment.
career.5.title: Data Analyst and Frontend Developer
career.5.description: Development of user interfaces and analysis of large volumes of data for specific modules in the automotive sector, using modern web technologies to improve user experience.
career.6.title: Programmer (Financial Sector)
career.6.description: Data analysis and exploitation within the financial department. Development of complex procedures in PL/SQL Oracle 11c for optimization of business processes and asset management.
career.7.title: Support and Development Technician
career.7.description: Resolution of critical incidents through 'hot code' solutions and corrective/evolutionary maintenance of the corporate framework, ensuring continuity of customer service.
career.8.title: Junior Programmer (Industrial Sector)
career.8.description: Development of graphical interfaces and forms for the aluminum sector, focused on digitization of industrial processes and production control under PL/SQL environments.
career.9.title: Freelance Web Developer
career.9.description: Comprehensive management of web projects for companies and individuals. Complete cycle: pre-sale, budgeting, Full-stack development (PHP/MySQL) and SEO optimization.
career.10.title: IT Technician
career.10.description: Preventive and corrective maintenance of technological infrastructure (hardware and software) and technical support to center users.
career.11.title: Vodafone Help Desk
career.11.description: Second level technical support for the Vodafone platform, specialized in diagnosis and remote repair of network failures and services.
career.12.title: Web Designer (Internship)
career.12.description: Development and maintenance of online contest platforms and creation of visual material for organizing university sports events.
career.13.title: IT Technician (Internship)
career.13.description: Repair, assembly and configuration of professional computer equipment and maintenance of peripherals.
